By clicking extend, you will extend the: Kliknutím na Extend protáhnete vypršení tipu na datum:
By enabling this option, the system will: By enabling this option, the system will be storing the submitted files unecrypted on your node.

Click to edit, Drag to order: Click to edit, Drag to order
Clicking the 'admin' link on the top-rig: Clicking the 'admin' link on the top-right corner of the page will bring you here.
Contexts are the categories to be select: Contexts are the categories to be selected by whistleblowers, when they perform their submission. Make sure to make them pertinent to your initiative.

Each message written by the whistleblowe: Each message written by the whistleblower specifically for you will trigger an email.

Enter the email address through which th: Zadejte e-mailovou adresu, přes kterou bude příjemce upozorněn.

Every comment, written by the whistleblo: Každý komentář sepsaný informátorem nebo příjemcem spustí email.
Every new Tip you receive will trigger a: Při každém novém tipu obdržíte spouštěcí email s odkazem na tento tip.
Follow us on Twitter if you like to be p: Následujte nás na Twitteru - pokud byste rádi vstoupili do profily společnosti NSA.
For every file available for download yo: S každým novým souborem dostupným pro stažení budete upozorněni emailem s odpovídající informací.
For technical support inquiries you can: Pro technickou podporu je požadováno kontaktovat:
Give your whistleblowing initiative a go: Give your whistleblowing initiative a good name and description to invite whistleblowers to submit. Be sure to make the goals of your project clear.

Please do not forward or share this e-ma: Please do not forward or share this e-mail: each tip-off allows a limited number of accesses and downloads before being destroyed forever and nobody (even the node administrator) can recover an expired or dead tip-off.
Please never disclose these files until: Please never disclose these files until an appropriate analysis, fact checking, journalistic and technical redaction process. For more information about redaction of documents you should consult this page: https://github.com/globaleaks/GlobaLeaks/wiki/Redaction-process.
Please support Hermes through their dona: Please support Hermes through their donation page.
Please take care that all associated dat: Please take care that all associated data is properly deleted and all receivers won't be able to further access to it.
Please take care that all associated data is properly deleted.
Please wait while we return to fully ope: Please wait while we return to fully operational
Public resources can be accessed via Tor: Povolen přístup k veřejným zdrojům via Tor2web
Receivers are very important for a Globa: Receivers are very important for a GlobaLeaks based initiative. They are the people responsible for receiving the whistleblowers' submissions, verifying their authenticity and taking action upon them. Choose them wisely.
Příjemci mohou mít přístup via Tor2web

The included files may contain informati: The included files may contain information that could lead to the identification of the whistleblower and/or that is sensitive for the people and organisations involved.

There are three types of users inside of: There are three types of users inside of GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receivers and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the node as the administrator will be 'admin'.
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.
This happens whenever encryption is unav: This happens whenever encryption is unavailable.
This has happened on context %ContextNam: This has happened on context %ContextName% at %EventTime%.
This interface may help you spot anomali: Toto rozhraní může napomoci odkrýt anomálie ve Vašem Nódu.
This interface may help you understand h: This interface may help you understand how the Node can be configured and provides some info on how to connect to other GlobaLeaks users and experts.

This interface may help you understand how the Node is used by the whistleblower. It displays the submissions currently on the node and a few statistics on the kind of usage (activity, files, comments).
This interface permits to configure the: This interface permits to configure the email templates used for secure mail notifications.
This interface permits to configure the email templates used for unsecure mail notifications.
This interface shows the activity of the: Toto rozhraní ukzauje aktivity užitavelů Vašeho nódu. Může být užitečné při detekci anomálií a podpory příjemců z Vašeho nódu.
This interface shows the latest anomalie: This interface shows the latest anomalies spotted by the system.
This interface shows you the statistics: Interface vám ukazuje statistiky za posledních několik hodin.
This is a work-in-progress of the admini: This is a work-in-progress of the administration interface that you will see after logging onto the platform as an admin.
This is an e-mail message to notify you: This is an e-mail message to notify you about new message from the whisleblower.
This is an e-mail message to notify you that %CommentSource% has commented on a previous submission.
This is an e-mail message to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient for his/her submission.
This is an e-mail message to notify you that a whistleblower has updated a submission with new material.
This is an e-mail message to notify you that your PGP key is expired on %PGPExpirationDate%
This is an e-mail message to notify you that your PGP key is going to expire on %PGPExpirationDate%

This may lead to unintended access to th: To může vézt k nechtěnému přístupu k souborům adminsitrátorem serveru v případě sizingu, změny konfigurace  serveru.
This means that the submitted files will: This means that the submitted files will be stored in plaintext on the node.
This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks software specifically designed to protect the identity of the submitter and of the receiver in the exchange of leaked materials.
This receipt will allow you to login as: Toto potvrzení Vám umožňuje přihlásit se jako informátor pro tento tip.

Through this system receivers will be ab: Pomocí tohoto systému budou příjemci schopni se ptát na otázky týkající se tipu a budou schopni psát své reakce - reply.
To enable it, his public key must be loa: To enable it, his public key must be loaded by the admin or by the receiver.
To ensure your anonymity be sure that yo:
Pro zajištění Vaší anonymity zabezpečte, že navštěvujete tuto stránku pomocí Tor Browser Bundle.
Souhlasíte, že chyba, kterou uděláte, může mít důsledek v technickém omezení ochrany Vaší identity.
Pro další vylepšení Vaší bezpečnosti následujte tyto instrukce:
1) V okamžiku, kdy chcete zůstat v anonymitě, neposílejte žádná osobní data (tj. jméno, vztah k viníkovi). Neposílejte také žádné informace pomocí kterých je možné Vás zpětně vystopovat.
2) Prosím neposílejte Váš report na PC poskytnuté Vaším zaměstnavatelem. Částečně i prostředí intranetu může ohrozit Vaši anonymitu.

Zaškrtnutím boxu níže souhlasíte s těmito podmínkami užití.

When the option is re-enabled the spoole: Neodeslané emaily budou ve frontě dokud nebude nastavení znovupovoleno.

Whistleblowers can perform submissions v: Whistlebloweři mohou provádět podání přes Tor2web
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing: S odevzdáním příspěvku pomocí HTTPS se vystavujete riziku, že někdo jiný zjistí, že jste právě něco poslali bez znalosti obsahu .
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Bez platného klíče PGP nebude moci systém odeslat šifrovanou notifikaci.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: Jste si vědom příslušného rizika, pokračujte dále s rozvážností.
You are connecting to the node without a: Nepřipojujete se k nódu anonymně. Tento nód podporuje pouze anonymní podání
You are invited to extend its validity a: You are invited to extend its validity and reload it on the platform or to upload a new key.
You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat: You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat via IRC on OFTC server on channel #globaleaks:
You have finished configuring your Globa: Podařilo se vám dokončit vaše nastavení GlobalLeaks. Pokud stojíte o další dolaďování, prosím použijte admin interface
You have not configured your encryption: You have not configured your encryption keys, so the files will be stored on the GlobaLeaks node un-encrypted.
You will also be able to keep track of w: Budete také schopen sledovat, kdo si prohlédl Vaše podání a stáhnul soubory.

Your user has reached the maximum number: Váš uživatel dosáhl maximálního počtu přístupů k danému tipu
can be configured to deliver encrypted e: can be configured to deliver encrypted email and store encrypted files. You  must copy and paste the ascii version of your personal key, and then it will be possibile to update your encryption settings. If you have any doubts, talk to your admin.
